flail right arm
conservative
original mva admission five months pta:
fracture dislocation c5-c6 with left sided perched facets.

followup studies on this admission:
anterior fusion c5-6
avulsion of the c5, c6 and c7 nerve roots on the left with pseudomeningocele foramation
cervical nerve root avulsion
lateral meningocele or pseudomeningocele
• trauma with root avulsion
• neurofibromatosis
24 y.o. man with hx of motor vehicle accident five months ago.  now being worked up for flail right arm.
